mapper.sql: S.FID AS id, S.FCPID AS cpId, S.FREMARK AS remark, S.FNAME AS signParamName, S.FTYPE AS signTypeEnum, S.FPOSITION AS positionEnum, S.FSIGN_ORDER_TYPE AS signParamOrderEnum, S.FPARAM AS paramNames, S.FSINGLE_PARAM_FORMAT AS singleParamFormat, S.FBEGIN AS beginCharacter, S.FEND AS endCharacter, S.FSPLICE AS spliceCharacter, S.FSIGNKEY AS signKeyMap, S.FHAS_LAST_SPLICE AS hasLastSplice, S.FCREATE_TIME AS createTime, S.FUPDATE_TIME AS updateTime
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_GRAB_SIGN
FCPID=#{cpId},
FREMARK=#{remark},
FNAME=#{signParamName},
FTYPE=#{signTypeEnum},
FPOSITION=#{positionEnum},
FSIGN_ORDER_TYPE=#{signParamOrderEnum},
FPARAM=#{paramNames},
FSINGLE_PARAM_FORMAT=#{singleParamFormat},
FBEGIN=#{beginCharacter},
FEND=#{endCharacter},
FSPLICE=#{spliceCharacter},
FSIGNKEY=#{signKeyMap},
FHAS_LAST_SPLICE=#{hasLastSplice},
FUPDATE_TIME=NOW(),
WHERE FID = #{id}
